summary: A movie created from "found footage" of a lost military expedition that exposes the origins of life on earth.
cast: Philip Coc|Eric Darins|Daniela Flynn|Mjr. John Frear|Dennis Johnson|Trey McCurley|Kent Noralez|Saul Pech|Peter Pedrero|Andres Rash|Rupert Tablada|Alan Usher|Chelsea Vincent
title: Alien Origin
